additionalInfo.description: Process incoming messages from devices with the alarm rules defined in the device profile. Dispatch all incoming messages with "Success" relation type.

configuration.jsScript: return 'interval' in msg || 'reboot' in msg || 'labelSetting' in msg;

additionalInfo.description: For use in the "Resumen" Page (Alarm severity and MSG saved to device att)

configuration.tbelScript: return {msg: msg, metadata: metadata, msgType: msgType};
